DOC.brief_title: An Email Intervention Prevent Iatrogenic Malnutrition ICU
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective study look determine targeted email clinician take care critically ill patient allow reduce malnutrition Intensive Care Units ( ICU ) . Four ICUs include : medical ICU ( MICU ) , coronary care unit ( CCU ) two surgical ICUs . The investigator rotate 2 month period intervention amongst aforementioned participate ICUs follow simultaneous cohort evaluate effect intervention ( email feedback treat clinician ) nutrition delivery ICU . After completion intervention , six-month follow-up nutritional adequacy assess durability change behavior .
DOC.criteria: Clinicians take care patient admit ICU within past 48hrs Clinicians take care patient enteral nutrition prescribe Clinicians take care patient enteral nutrition prescribed .
DOC.keyword: Malnutrition ICU ( caloric deficit > 4000 kcal 150 g protein deficit ) > 48hrs admission without receive nutrition
